00055 #ifndef __AUDACITY_IMPORTER__
00056 #define __AUDACITY_IMPORTER__
00057 
00058 #include <wx/arrstr.h>
00059 #include <wx/filename.h>
00060 #include <wx/string.h>
00061 #include <wx/list.h>
00062 
00063 #include "../widgets/ProgressDialog.h"
00064 
00065 class TrackFactory;
00066 class Track;
00067 class Tags;
00068 
00069 class ImportFileHandle;
00070 
00071 class ImportPlugin
00072 {
00073 public:
00074 
00075    // Get a description of the file type this importer can import.
00076    // Examples: "Ogg Vorbis", "MP3", "Uncompressed PCM"
00077    virtual wxString GetPluginFormatDescription() = 0;
00078 
00079    // Get a list of extensions this plugin expects to be able to
00080    // import.  If a filename matches any of these extensions,
00081    // this importer will get first dibs on importing it.
00082    virtual wxArrayString GetSupportedExtensions()
00083    {
00084       return mExtensions;
00085    }
00086 
00087    bool SupportsExtension(wxString extension)
00088    {
00089       // Case-insensitive check if extension is supported
00090       return mExtensions.Index(extension, false) != wxNOT_FOUND;
00091    }
00092 
00093    // Open the given file, returning true if it is in a recognized
00094    // format, false otherwise.  This puts the importer into the open
00095    // state.
00096    virtual ImportFileHandle *Open(wxString Filename) = 0;
00097 
00098    virtual ~ImportPlugin() { }
00099 
00100 protected:
00101 
00102    ImportPlugin(wxArrayString supportedExtensions):
00103       mExtensions(supportedExtensions)
00104    {
00105    }
00106 
00107    wxArrayString mExtensions;
00108 };
00109 
00110 
00111 class ImportFileHandle
00112 {
00113 public:
00114    ImportFileHandle(const wxString & filename)
00115    :  mFilename(filename),
00116    mProgress(NULL)
00117    {
00118    }
00119 
00120    virtual ~ImportFileHandle()
00121    {
00122       if (mProgress != NULL)
00123       {
00124          delete mProgress;
00125       }
00126    }
00127 
00128    // The importer should call this to create the progress dialog and
00129    // identify the filename being imported.
00130    void CreateProgress()
00131    {
00132       wxFileName f(mFilename);
00133       wxString title;
00134 
00135       title.Printf(_("Importing %s"), GetFileDescription().c_str());
00136       mProgress = new ProgressDialog(title,
00137                                      f.GetFullName());
00138    }
00139 
00140    // This is similar to GetImporterDescription, but if possible the
00141    // importer will return a more specific description of the
00142    // specific file that is open.
00143    virtual wxString GetFileDescription() = 0;
00144 
00145    // Return an estimate of how many bytes the file will occupy once
00146    // imported
00147    virtual int GetFileUncompressedBytes() = 0;
00148 
00149    // do the actual import, creating whatever tracks are necessary with
00150    // the TrackFactory and calling the progress callback every iteration
00151    // through the importing loop
00152    virtual int Import(TrackFactory *trackFactory, Track ***outTracks,
00153                       int *outNumTracks, Tags *tags) = 0;
00154 
00155    // Return number of elements in stream list
00156    virtual wxInt32 GetStreamCount() = 0;
00157 
00158    // Return stream descriptions list
00159    virtual wxArrayString *GetStreamInfo() = 0;
00160 
00161    // Set stream "import/don't import" flag
00162    virtual void SetStreamUsage(wxInt32 StreamID, bool Use) = 0;
00163 
00164 protected:
00165    wxString mFilename;
00166    ProgressDialog *mProgress;
00167 };

00171 class UnusableImportPlugin
00172 {
00173 public:
00174    UnusableImportPlugin(wxString formatName, wxArrayString extensions):
00175       mFormatName(formatName),
00176       mExtensions(extensions)
00177    {
00178    }
00179 
00180    wxString GetPluginFormatDescription()
00181    {
00182       return mFormatName;
00183    }
00184 
00185    bool SupportsExtension(wxString extension)
00186    {
00187       return mExtensions.Index(extension, false) != wxNOT_FOUND;
00188    }
00189 
00190 private:
00191    wxString mFormatName;
00192    wxArrayString mExtensions;
00193 };
